summary: A collection of unit tests that validate the integration of the TensorBoard logger with PyTorch Lightning, covering automatic and manual versioning, finalization, hyperparameter and metric logging, graph logging, handling of Omegaconf configurations, subdirectory management, symlink support, and behavior with accumulated gradients.
business_intent: To guarantee that TensorBoard logging works reliably for machine learning experiments, enabling accurate tracking, reproducibility, and monitoring of model training and configuration details.
